$ gocdk help demo
TODO more about demos

Usage:
  gocdk demo [command]

Available Commands:
  add         TODO Add a demo
  list        TODO List available demos

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for demo

Use "gocdk demo [command] --help" for more information about a command.

$ gocdk demo -h
TODO more about demos

Usage:
  gocdk demo [command]

Available Commands:
  add         TODO Add a demo
  list        TODO List available demos

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for demo

Use "gocdk demo [command] --help" for more information about a command.

$ gocdk demo --help
TODO more about demos

Usage:
  gocdk demo [command]

Available Commands:
  add         TODO Add a demo
  list        TODO List available demos

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for demo

Use "gocdk demo [command] --help" for more information about a command.
